posts.post_title: FS: T206 Mordecai Brown Portrait & Jack Chesbro Both PSA
posts.post_content:
*SOLD* for the pair-I am not splitting these up at this time-only selling to fund a Cy Young purchase:( Paypal FF please. Thank you for looking!
Joe
